name: Part 1 - Excel macros
descripton: When to use each macro will be covered by the preprocessing tutorials but this will go through how to download and run the macros on your device.
First go onto sharepoint and download the macros onto your machine
Alternatively you can use the files on the harddrive
To run the macros you first need to import them into excel

name: Part 2 - Enabling developer tools
descripton: To run the macros onto your device, you will need to enable 'Developer' tools in excel

name: Part 3  - Importing macros into excel
description: Click 'Developer' and then open the code editor 'Visual Basic'
Import each macro from sharepoint into your PERSONAL workbook
This will allow you to run the macro on any excel spreadsheet opened on your device
You will only need to do this once
Hopefully you will not need to edit the code but this is the screen to do it
You can now close visual basic

name: Part 4 - Running a macro
description: To run the macro, on the 'Developer' tab click 'Macros'
Then select the macro you wish to use and click 'Run'
When running the macros ensure you have the correct sheet selected
